title: Ticket #7396: Backport new "job abort" event log format
description:
In #7158, we improved the error message for the job abort user log type from "Job was aborted by the user" to "Job was aborted".

Unfortunately, this caused a forward compatibility break: job logs produced by a 8.9.x schedd can no longer be read by 8.8.x client tools. We should do a 8.8.x bugfix to accept either log line format (that is, I like the improved message but we should just restore compatibility).

This forward compatibility is important in cases where the user might have their own conda-installed python bindings in an older series but the system schedd is newer.
creator: bbockelm
